values: 肩膀，肩部；肩负，承担
A shoulder is the body part between the top of the arm and the neck.
He carried his bike on his shoulder.

To shoulder is to carry or bear the weight or responsibility of something, often metaphorically.
A shoulder is the part of the body that connects the arm to the torso.
